title: What's Wrong With the NBA? And Whose Job Is It to Fix It? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by Ben Falk from ‘Cleaning the Glass’ to discuss NBA rule changes vs. team and player innovations to get a competitive edge, and how the NBA league office is responsible for keeping pace with the speed at which innovations are found with the use of analytics (06:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Ben Falk
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
